messages.subject: Subject: Re: god, the trinity and father figures
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 8/15/2002 5:33:38 PM Central Daylight Time, ... Oh shoot.....Sandra.... we are not going to have you around for 4 days.........not
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 8/15/2002 5:33:38 PM Central Daylight Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:


> OH I meant to say truth, compassion and UNSCHOOLING.
>
> I know you're getting irritated Bob, and I'm about to leave town for four
> days. You'll have a chance to recover.
>

Oh shoot.....Sandra.... we are not going to have you around for 4
days.........not fair........what are we going to do....lol


There are differences in religion and we should have acceptance......Same
thing with homeschooling....
In schools the have the certain groups or cliques. If you don't belong to
that certain group than you are not accepted or you mean nothing.....We talk
about how damaging that is to some of the kids.....
We don't want them feeling left out or not worthy because we don't belong to
a specific clique or group. People don't realize that they are doing the same
things to each other when it comes to religion........If you don't belong or
believe a certain way.......then you are ousted.......
I am learning to care less....It's been a hard thing to learn and accept that
this the way that it has to be.
I really appreciate Joyce & Brenda for their words and support.
I have said today..........ENOUGH!!!!!!
I have to draw the battle line......I have to start swinging back...I have
the power to win for myself and what I need to do for me. Just gotta use
it.......

Kim


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
